summary: The implementation successfully delivers all requested requirements. The calculator features a complete number pad (0-9), decimal point, clear button, four arithmetic operations, a display screen, sequential operation handling, and a warm earth-tone visual theme with excellent typography and button hierarchy. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the code evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support with automatic dark mode color variants
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists as a non-goal: no mention of dark mode support. However, the implementation includes comprehensive dark mode styling throughout (frontend/src/index.css, frontend/src/components/*.tsx with dark: prefixes)

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest makes no mention of user authentication or identity management

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister with actor setup for ICP blockchain integration
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested. The BuildRequest specifies only frontend requirements with no backend or blockchain integration mentioned
